sentences.en: A semicircular space in front of the stage used by the chorus in ancient Greek theaters.
sentences.cn: 由合唱队在演古典希腊戏剧时唱的颂诗.

sentences.en: A small dilatation a canal or duct, especially one in the semicircular canal of the ear.
sentences.cn: '壶'.''''.'腹'. ''通管或导管内的小的膨起, 尤指耳朵的半规管内.

sentences.en: It is usually a semicircular wheaten food with stuffing.
sentences.cn: 它通常是有馅的半圆形的麦制食品.

sentences.en: Objective To observe the changes of ABR threshold during semicircular canal occlusion in normal guinea pigs.
sentences.cn: 目的　观察正常豚鼠行三个半规管阻塞术中ABR反应阈值的动态变化.

sentences.en: Please pass me that pile of semicircular tiles.
sentences.cn: 请把那一摞筒瓦递给我.

sentences.en: The auditorium originated in the theaters of ancient Greece, as a semicircular seating area a hillside.
sentences.cn: 观众厅起源于古希腊的剧院, 为嵌入山坡的半圆形座位区.

sentences.en: The semicircular jiao zi was about five centimeters long.
sentences.cn: 那半圆的饺子大概五公分长.

sentences.en: The switch window comprises two semicircular elastic pieces.
sentences.cn: 所述的开关窗是由两个半圆形的弹性片组成的.

sentences.en: This article shows the design method for probe having semicircular cylinder face and the capacitance's calculation.
sentences.cn: 论述了半圆筒面探头的设计方法与电容量的计算.

trans.tran_en: Something that is semicircular has the shape of half a circle
